name: Tennis Dog: Ultimate Good Boy
description:
"Everyone wants to be a dog fighting robots with tennis balls" -The dog-

Enjoy the frenzy of wildness battles against “the association of robots hating dogs”, in this 2D battle tennis game full of fun and craziness, try to achieve the highest score in each fight and become the best dog a human would ever have.

Controls:
Right and left key: Horizontal Move
Up key or space: punch the ball

And if you want to prove that you can be a better dog than your friends, challenge them in the multiplayer mode and assure your place as the man's best friend.

If you liked the game and want to see more of my dev journey follow me on Instagram https://www.instagram.com/erizux.dev/  and the artists who made the music are CharlieJr  and  Yukun
